clinical_study.brief_title: Three Dimensional Evaluation of Nasolabial Changes Following Classic vs Without Alar Base Suture After Le Fort I Osteotomy
clinical_study.official_title: Three Dimensional Evaluation of Nasolabial Changes Following Classic vs Without Alar Base Suture After Le Fort I Osteotomy

brief_summary.textblock:
Three dimensional evaluation of nasolabial changes following classic vs without alar base suture after
Le Fort I osteotomy
A randomized controlled clinical trial

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Three dimensional evaluation of nasolabial changes following classic vs without alar base suture after Le Fort I osteotomy

arm_group.arm_group_label: 3d evaluation of naso labial changes using alar cinch suture
3d evaluation of nasolabial change without Alar cinch

intervention.description: Evaluation of With vs without ala cinch suture after lefort 1 osteotomy
intervention.arm_group_label: 3d evaluation of naso labial changes using alar cinch suture
3d evaluation of nasolabial change without Alar cinch

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Adult patients with skeletal maxillomandibular deformity indicated for surgical correction by Le Fort I osteotomy.
2. Absence of growth.
3. Patients must be willing for the surgical procedure and follow-up, with his informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- 4. History of facial trauma with fractures of facial bones. 5. History of surgical operation in nasal region. 6. Facial asymmetry. 7. Patients with accompanying craniofacial syndromes. 8. Patients with any diseases that compromise bone or soft tissue healing. 9. Anterior open bite cases. 10. Clefts ( lip and palate). 11. Medically compromised patients not fit for general anaesthesia. 12. missing preoperative or postop-erative 3D photographs or CBCT scans 13. multi-segment Le Fort I osteotomy 14. rhinoplasty surgery during or within 1 year after the Le Fort I osteotomy
